1.name: The Karate Kid
1.description: A boy and his mother move to California for a new job. He struggles to fit in, as a group of karate students starts to bully him for dating a rich girl from their clique. It's up to the Japanese landlord, Miyagi, to teach him karate.

2.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
2.description: The monstrous spirit of a slain child murderer seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.

3.name: The Terminator
3.description: A seemingly indestructible robot is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a young waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against sentient machines, while a human soldier from the same war is sent to protect her at all costs.

4.name: Dune
4.description: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

5.name: Ghostbusters
5.description: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

6.name: This Is Spinal Tap
6.description: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

7.name: Once Upon a Time in America
7.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

8.name: Gremlins
8.description: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

9.name: The NeverEnding Story
9.description: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

10.name: Police Academy
10.description: A group of good-hearted, but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

11.name: Children of the Corn
11.description: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.

12.name: Supergirl
12.description: After losing a powerful orb, Kara Zor-El, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.

13.name: Amadeus
13.description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

14.name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
14.description: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

15.name: Sixteen Candles
15.description: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

16.name: Beverly Hills Cop
16.description: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

17.name: Revenge of the Nerds
17.description: At Adams College, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self-respect.

18.name: Nineteen Eighty-Four
18.description: In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

19.name: Footloose
19.description: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

20.name: Red Dawn
20.description: It is the dawn of World War III. In mid-western America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

21.name: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
21.description: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

22.name: Splash
22.description: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.

23.name: Sheena
23.description: Sheena grew up in the African wild, raised by a mystical witch woman. When her foster mother is framed for a murder Sheena is forced to flee, helped by her ability to talk to animals and her knowledge of the jungle.

24.name: The Cotton Club
24.description: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people who visited the club, those who ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

25.name: C.H.U.D.
25.description: A bizarre series of sudden disappearances on the streets of New York City seems to point toward something unsavory living in the sewers.

26.name: Romancing the Stone
26.description: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.

27.name: Top Secret!
27.description: Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.

28.name: Paris, Texas
28.description: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

29.name: The Bounty
29.description: Fed up with their Captain's harsh discipline, a sailing ship's crew decides to take action.

30.name: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
30.description: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

31.name: Body Double
31.description: A young actor's obsession with spying on a beautiful woman who lives nearby leads to a baffling series of events with drastic consequences.

32.name: The Last Starfighter
32.description: Video game expert Alex Rogan finds himself transported to another planet after conquering The Last Starfighter video game only to find out it was just a test. He was recruited to join the team of best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

33.name: Streets of Fire
33.description: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

34.name: Blame It on Rio
34.description: Best friends and their daughters vacation in Rio de Janeiro only for one to fall for the other's daughter.

35.name: Conan the Destroyer
35.description: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

36.name: Night of the Comet
36.description: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

37.name: Bachelor Party
37.description: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

38.name: Purple Rain
38.description: A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

39.name: Kaze no tani no Naushika
39.description: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

40.name: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
40.description: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery... and HAL.

41.name: Blood Simple
41.description: A rich but jealous man hires a private investigator to kill his cheating wife and her new man. But, when blood is involved, nothing is simple.

42.name: The Natural
42.description: An unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary player with almost divine talent.

43.name: Against All Odds
43.description: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

44.name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
44.description: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis Planet to recover Spock's body.

45.name: No Small Affair
45.description: The 16 years old amateur photographer Charles accidentally takes a photo of Laura - and falls in love with her, when he develops the picture. He finds out that she works as singer in a bar,...                See full summary »

46.name: Repo Man
46.description: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

47.name: Midt om natten
47.description: Benny (Kim Larsen) and Arnold (Erik Clausen) are homeless and along with others living on Nørrebro in Copenhagen. The police is set to clear the building they squat in, but on the night of ...                See full summary »

48.name: Mrs. Soffel
48.description: Peter Soffel is the stuffy warden of a remote American prison around the turn of the century. His wife, Kate, finds herself attracted to prisoner Ed Biddle. She abandons her husband and ...                See full summary »

49.name: The Woman in Red
49.description: On his way to work, Teddy spots Charlotte, an incredibly beautiful Woman in Red. He really wants to meet her, but what would his wife say?

50.name: Firestarter
50.description: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telekinetic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.
